highlights: Made a Python program using Tkinter, PYPDF2, Pdf2Image and PIL to automate the process of splitting a pdf question paper with up to 40 questions into a JPEG of each question on it's own reducing time needed to split the questions by almost 95%

Automated classifying the questions into chapters using an AI naive-bayes text classifier with sci-kit to  analyze the keywords that are specific to that chapter using training data and reaching an accuracy of  90%

Built a Next.js website to allow teachers to dynamically add questions to a worksheet which can exported as a PDF. Also allowed students to interactively solve questions with tracking their progress and displaying explanations made with Gemini's api.
Made a Python web scraping tool using python-requests and BeatifulSoup to get links for previous past  papers from another website to automate downloading and hosting the files on AWS S3.

skills.name: Programming Languages
keywords: Python, JavaScript, C++, C,  HTML, CSS

projects.name: YOLO Latex Math Parser
projects.description: A Math parser that takes as input images which contain both Latex and normal text which then separates Latex formulas from the text using a custom made YOLO object detection model and uses the LatexOCR for those and PyTesseract for the normal text.

An Instagram Bot that automatically moves the mouse to follow people that follow related pages to yours, went from 50 followers on a test page to 500 in less than 10 days. Undetectable as it manually moves the mouse instead of interacting with the browser using Selenium.
projects.name: InstaFollower
g-drive
projects.description: A Google Drive Ripoff built with PocketBase. It offers file uploads, folder creation, previews of Images and mp3 files.

projects.name: Planet Simulation
projects.description: A useful tool to map the trajectories of different planets and measure the eccentricity of their orbits using Newton's Laws of Gravitation.

awards.title: 5th place at RoboCup @ Home Education 2024
awards.summary: Developed and integrated an object detection system using a pre-existing model to identify objects within the robot's environment, coupled with a depth camera to calculate precise object coordinates and depth. Leveraged this data to enhance the robotâ€™s perception, providing real-time inputs to the SLAM software for improved localization, mapping, and autonomous navigation in dynamic environments.
